snmp.description: OKI OkiLAN 8150e Rev.P2.03 10/100BASE Ethernet PrintServer: Attached to B4600 Rev.H2.03 : (C)2006 Oki Data Corporation

comments.en:
Toner tube is about $120 (7K pages), drum cartridge is $125 (its resource is about 25K pages). Toner refilling is possible, but be careful, these printers are picky about original toner. YMMV.
Throughput = 26
Foomatic entry made by PPDtoXML T/G 0.18 on 2008-06-23
